title.rendered: Modern House in Toronto by <?php echo $name; ?>

content.rendered:
Portfolio

Modern house in Toronto by







Previous
Next





Modern house in Toronto by

Project Description

This house had to fit on a very narrow lot and we were able to include everything the Client wished for. The house stands out from the others on the street by its modern approach and striking wood structure.

Share on facebook
Share on google
Share on twitter
Share on linkedin

Project Details

Modern Home in Toronto

  • Client: Private Owner
  • Location: Holborne Ave. Toronto, ON
  • GFA: 2,500 sq.f
  • Year Completed: 2016
  • Budget: $ 750,000
  • Architect:

Looking for Architects for your next project?

We have the best solution for your project. Quality and innovation to make your plans come true.

Contact us
